r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added - Official support for PHP 7.4 #723 - Tools to measure memory overhead #718
### Changed - Move Laravel to sanboxed api #700 - Remove the sandbox API for PHP 5.4 #719 - Dual-licensed under Apache 2.0 or BSD3 #727
### Fixed - README reference to RELEASING.md was removed #720 (thanks @v1v!) - MessagePack serialization with a reference #730
